text: Ali Mufuruki (1959 – December 7, 2019) was a Tanzanian businessman, author, founder and board member of several organisations. He was the founder of Infotech Investment Group. He was the board chairman of Vodacom Tanzania and Wananchi Group Holdings. He was the co-author of the book Tanzania's Industrialisation Journey, 2016–2056. He died on 7 December 2019 at the Morningside Hospital in Johannesburg. == References == Category:1959 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Tanzanian writers Category:African businesspeople
title: Ali Mufuruki
